name: LendingPoolConfigurator
description: LendingPoolConfigurator contract. Implements the configuration methods for the Aave protocol*.

eventDecorators.name: ATokenUpgraded
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token. Emitted when an aToken implementation is upgraded.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: proxy
parameterDecorators.description: The aToken proxy address.

parameterDecorators.name: implementation
parameterDecorators.description: The new aToken implementation*.

eventDecorators.name: BorrowingDisabledOnReserve
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token. Emitted when borrowing is disabled on a reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve*.

eventDecorators.name: BorrowingEnabledOnReserve
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token. Emitted when borrowing is enabled on a reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: stableRateEnabled
parameterDecorators.description: True if stable rate borrowing is enabled, false otherwise*.

eventDecorators.name: CollateralConfigurationChanged
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token. Emitted when the collateralization risk parameters for the specified asset are updated.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: ltv
parameterDecorators.description: The loan to value of the asset when used as collateral.

parameterDecorators.name: liquidationThreshold
parameterDecorators.description: The threshold at which loans using this asset as collateral will be considered undercollateralized.

parameterDecorators.name: liquidationBonus
parameterDecorators.description: The bonus liquidators receive to liquidate this asset*.

eventDecorators.name: ReserveActivated
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token. Emitted when a reserve is activated.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve*.

eventDecorators.name: ReserveDeactivated
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token. Emitted when a reserve is deactivated.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve*.

eventDecorators.name: ReserveDecimalsChanged
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token. Emitted when the reserve decimals are updated.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: decimals
parameterDecorators.description: The new decimals*.

eventDecorators.name: ReserveFactorChanged
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token. Emitted when a reserve factor is updated.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: factor
parameterDecorators.description: The new reserve factor*.

eventDecorators.name: ReserveFrozen
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token. Emitted when a reserve is frozen.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve*.

eventDecorators.name: ReserveInitialized
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token. Emitted when a reserve is initialized.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: aToken
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the associated aToken contract.

parameterDecorators.name: stableDebtToken
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the associated stable rate debt token.

parameterDecorators.name: variableDebtToken
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the associated variable rate debt token.

parameterDecorators.name: interestRateStrategyAddress
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the interest rate strategy for the reserve*.

eventDecorators.name: ReserveInterestRateStrategyChanged
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token. Emitted when a reserve interest strategy contract is updated.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: strategy
parameterDecorators.description: The new address of the interest strategy contract*.

eventDecorators.name: ReserveUnfrozen
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token. Emitted when a reserve is unfrozen.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve*.

eventDecorators.name: StableDebtTokenUpgraded
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token. Emitted when the implementation of a stable debt token is upgraded.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: proxy
parameterDecorators.description: The stable debt token proxy address.

parameterDecorators.name: implementation
parameterDecorators.description: The new aToken implementation*.

eventDecorators.name: StableRateDisabledOnReserve
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token. Emitted when stable rate borrowing is disabled on a reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve*.

eventDecorators.name: StableRateEnabledOnReserve
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token. Emitted when stable rate borrowing is enabled on a reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve*.

eventDecorators.name: VariableDebtTokenUpgraded
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token. Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: proxy
parameterDecorators.description: The variable debt token proxy address.

parameterDecorators.name: implementation
parameterDecorators.description: The new aToken implementation*.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve*.

functionDecorators.name: configureReserveAsCollateral
functionDecorators.description: Configures the reserve collateralization parameters all the values are expressed in percentages with two decimals of precision. A valid value is 10000, which means 100.00%.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: ltv
parameterDecorators.description: The loan to value of the asset when used as collateral.

parameterDecorators.name: liquidationThreshold
parameterDecorators.description: The threshold at which loans using this asset as collateral will be considered undercollateralized.

parameterDecorators.name: liquidationBonus
parameterDecorators.description: The bonus liquidators receive to liquidate this asset. The values is always above 100%. A value of 105% means the liquidator will receive a 5% bonus*.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve*.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve*.

functionDecorators.name: disableReserveStableRate
functionDecorators.description: Disable stable rate borrowing on a reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve*.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: stableBorrowRateEnabled
parameterDecorators.description: True if stable borrow rate needs to be enabled by default on this reserve*.

functionDecorators.name: enableReserveStableRate
functionDecorators.description: Enable stable rate borrowing on a reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve*.

functionDecorators.name: freezeReserve
functionDecorators.description: Freezes a reserve. A frozen reserve doesn't allow any new deposit, borrow or rate swap but allows repayments, liquidations, rate rebalances and withdrawals.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve*.

parameterDecorators.name: aTokenImpl
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the aToken contract implementation.

parameterDecorators.name: stableDebtTokenImpl
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the stable debt token contract.

parameterDecorators.name: variableDebtTokenImpl
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the variable debt token contract.

parameterDecorators.name: underlyingAssetDecimals
parameterDecorators.description: The decimals of the reserve underlying asset.

parameterDecorators.name: interestRateStrategyAddress
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the interest rate strategy contract for this reserve*.

functionDecorators.name: setPoolPause
functionDecorators.description: pauses or unpauses all the actions of the protocol, including aToken transfers.

parameterDecorators.name: val
parameterDecorators.description: true if protocol needs to be paused, false otherwise*.

functionDecorators.name: setReserveFactor
functionDecorators.description: Updates the reserve factor of a reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: reserveFactor
parameterDecorators.description: The new reserve factor of the reserve*.

functionDecorators.name: setReserveInterestRateStrategyAddress
functionDecorators.description: Sets the interest rate strategy of a reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: rateStrategyAddress
parameterDecorators.description: The new address of the interest strategy contract*.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve*.

functionDecorators.name: updateAToken
functionDecorators.description: Updates the aToken implementation for the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve to be updated.

parameterDecorators.name: implementation
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the new aToken implementation*.

functionDecorators.name: updateStableDebtToken
functionDecorators.description: Updates the stable debt token implementation for the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve to be updated.

parameterDecorators.name: implementation
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the new aToken implementation*.

functionDecorators.name: updateVariableDebtToken
functionDecorators.description: Updates the variable debt token implementation for the asset.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve to be updated.

parameterDecorators.name: implementation
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the new aToken implementation*.
